derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from medieval Latin penuriosus, from Latin penuria 'need, scarcity' (see penury)

means.word_mean: 1. not having enough money to pay for necessities

sentences.sentence: "parsimonious thrift relieved by few generous impulses"
"lived in a most penurious manner--denying himself every indulgence"
